description.title: Full-Stack Developer
description.text_1: I am a Full-Stack Developer with a passion for creating web applications. I have experience with JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Express.js. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn new technologies.
description.text_2: I am currently working on a personal project that involves creating a web application for managing tasks. I am using React for the front-end and Node.js for the back-end. I am also learning about databases and how to use them in web applications.
description.text_3: I am looking for a job as a Full-Stack Developer where I can use my skills to create web applications that help people solve problems and make their lives easier. I am open to working in a team and collaborating with other developers to create great software.

experience.uniwix: Responsible for implementing new features and debugging the ERP software. Working with a legacy codebase using vanilla PHP, PrototypeJS, jQuery, HTML5, and MySQL. Main tasks include optimizing SQL queries, developing dynamic business logic, and ensuring system efficiency. Version control is managed through Git and FTP-based workflows.
experience.develhope: Responsible for grading students exercises and providing feedback on their progress.
experience.wonderfulitaly: Responsible for debugging the web app, creating responsive styles and banners, implementing REST API/SOAP, developingmicroservices, creating new content for the CRM software, andextracting data/tables using SQL. Worked on severalchallenging tasks that I am still proud of. Technologies usedincluded Linux, Git, PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS, SCSS, MySQL,PostgreSQL, Docker, Doctrine, and Symfony.

projects.sentinel_api: SentinelApi is an API Gateway and API Key management system designed to help develop and monitor your APIs more easily.
